org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.network

Class NetworkDatacenterBroker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.CloudSimEntity
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.DatacenterBrokerAbstract
        • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.DatacenterBrokerSimple
          • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.network.NetworkDatacenterBroker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Runnable, DatacenterBroker, Identificable, Nameable, SimEntity

    public class NetworkDatacenterBroker
extends DatacenterBrokerSimple
    NetDatacentreBroker is a DatacenterBroker implementation that works with network components such as NetworkDatacenter, NetworkHost and NetworkVm. It accepts the submission of NetworkCloudlet lists, each one that composes a AppCloudlet.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 3.0
    Author:
    Saurabh Kumar Garg, Manoel Campos da Silva Filho
